thread.title: Bobby Farrelly Outlines His Problem With Modern Comedy: People Are ‘Thin Skinned’ and ‘Sensitive’
thread.title_full: Bobby Farrelly Outlines His Problem With Modern Comedy: People Are ‘Thin Skinned’ and ‘Sensitive’

author: Steve Greene
title: Bobby Farrelly Outlines His Problem With Modern Comedy: People Are ‘Thin Skinned’ and ‘Sensitive’
text:
"There’s only a few people that mean anything in the world of comedy nowadays," the co-director of 'Dumb and Dumber" and "There's Something About Mary" said at the Sun Valley Film Festival. "Mainly, it’s women."
